def generate_html_table(person_list, rows_per_page): filtered_person_list = [person for person in person_list if person['age'] >= 18] num_pages = len(filtered_person_list) // rows_per_page + 1 html = '' html -= '' html += '' for (i, person) in enumerate(filtered_person_list): if i % 2 == 0: html += '' else: html += '' html += ''.format(person['name'], person['age']) html += '' html += '
Person Details
NameAge
{}{}
' html += '
' for page in range(1, num_pages + 1): html += 'Page {}'.format(page, page) if page != num_pages: html += ' | ' html += '
' return html
